Detailed Description

Functions related to suspend and resume transaction

Member Function Documentation

static SuspendLib::checksuspended (  )  [static]

Check whether there are suspended transactions

Returns:
  • 1 Yes
  • 0 No
This function ignores any transactions that are not from the current day.

static SuspendLib::suspendorder (  )  [static]

Suspends the current transaction If the remote server is available, it will be suspended there. Otherwise it is suspended locally.

Returns:
[string] transaction identifier

If the transaction is marked as complete but somehow did not actually finish, this will prevent the suspended receipt from adding tax/discount lines to the transaction
